about_chinese: 嗨，我是明哲！在永續能源領域中，我專注於透過數據驅動的解決方案，促進環保與效率。我擁有國立台灣大學的電機工程學碩士學位，並在數據科學及機器學習領域有超過八年的專業經驗。在這段期間，我曾參與多個大型數據分析項目，專注於設計及實施創新型的數據分析模型。期待將我的專業知識應用於未來的挑戰，為綠色科技生態系統貢獻力量！
about_english: Hi, I'm Ming-Jhe! In the sustainable energy field, I focus on data-driven solutions that promote environmental sustainability and efficiency. I hold a Master's degree in Electrical Engineering from National Taiwan University and have over eight years of professional experience in Data Science and Machine Learning. During this time, I have participated in several large-scale data analytics projects, focusing on designing and implementing innovative data analytic models. I look forward to applying my expertise to future challenges and contributing to the green technology ecosystem!
